textContent:
---aftereffects 6---

I'm writing this at 3 in the morning kase nga di ako makatulog due to coffee (grabe tlaaga sensitivity ko, apaka consistent). And I just used this time to reflect on things (tho nakapag work narin ako). 

Rei,  I just want you to know how lucky I am to be loved by you. I just you to know how much it comforts me, and how much it makes me feel at peace to know that you genuinely really do love me 100%. You really are my home, and whenever I remember the fact that I have you, that we have a future planned together, makes feel like I could tackle anything and everything. I love you so much Rei. I hope I make you feel the same. I hope you can also feel the warmth of my love. Because I do, and I love and crave every single bit of it. 

You are my peace,
You are my home,
You are the bliss I crave when I'm alone.

You make me feel warm,
You make me feel secure,
You are everything that I can't endure.
title: May 8, 2024
textContentHtml:
---aftereffects 6---


I'm writing this at 3 in the morning kase nga di ako makatulog due to coffee (grabe tlaaga sensitivity ko, apaka consistent). And I just used this time to reflect on things (tho nakapag work narin ako). 


Rei,  I just want you to know how lucky I am to be loved by you. I just you to know how much it comforts me, and how much it makes me feel at peace to know that you genuinely really do love me 100%. You really are my home, and whenever I remember the fact that I have you, that we have a future planned together, makes feel like I could tackle anything and everything. I love you so much Rei. I hope I make you feel the same. I hope you can also feel the warmth of my love. Because I do, and I love and crave every single bit of it. 


You are my peace,

You are my home,

You are the bliss I crave when I'm alone.


You make me feel warm,

You make me feel secure,

You are everything that I can't endure.
